body:
A few notes from our conversation

* New parameter to getComponentRegressionMap to include "subdependency levels" 
* Take over graph.html for UI. Start with a single component
Is there an idea of what this UI would look like?
I'd start with a heatmap, like https://apexcharts.com/javascript-chart-demos/heatmap-charts/basic/. Or like the one that is currently present in graph.html.

Trying to understand this a bit more. If we have Component 1 and Component 2. We enter those into the function and they both have similar components. What is the heatmap actually supposed to display? Is it the amount the components have caused regressions? So if Component 1 had a component that caused a regression by 10%, and component 2 had that same regression,  but it was 5%, would the heatmap display that?

Yes, the heatmap would basically be something like:
![immagine](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1616846/105750998-bb054900-5f45-11eb-8ac9-05c7dd9075bf.png)
where both rows ("metric1", "metric2", etc.) and columns ("w1", "w2", etc.) would actually be components, and the color would be stronger or lighter according to the connection between the two components.

The "connection" between the components would be the number which is in the map returned by the function @bgrins introduced in #2089 (e.g. `connectionsMap["Component 1"]["Component 2"]`). It is currently the percentage you mentioned, but in the future it could be more complex and be generated by some kind of formula which takes into account multiple data points. It doesn't matter for this issue though, as you can "blindly" use `getComponentRegressionMap` and assume its map is the right one to draw.

It seems like this will just create 1 row. 

Component 1 as the row, and the components that are children of it within the JSON object as columns. Is that correct?
Thanks for that explanation marco. It seems the heatmap will be pretty big then, and that is why I kept asking for clarification.
Should I add the capability to select a few components to compare? I know that is something we want to add but I feel it is needed or the chart just never loads and is unusable really

issue.title: Add function to generate heatmap based off of regression data.

repository.name: bugbug
repository.description: Platform for Machine Learning projects on Software Engineering

body: A first version has been built in #2120, I've opened separate follow-up issues to track further work.
